works.title: Marijuana Analyzer
works.text: Marijuana Analyzer is a web app showing insights of marijuana effects on mental health and future drug abuse. Integrated with interactive data visualization and predictive machine learning models.
works.tag: JavaScript, Python, D3.js, Bootstrap, AWS, scikit-learn

works.title: Grocery Express Web Application
works.text: Grocery Express is a system that simulates the interactions between various customers and grocery stores, along with third party entities that facilitate the placement and delivery of orders.
works.tag: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, MySQL, Redis, Thymeleaf

works.title: Furniture Sales Reporting System
works.text: Furniture Sales Reporting System is a sales reporting system with a dashboard UI to support enterprise decision making. The database is designed and optimized for reporting and analysis over millions of records.

works.title: MovieDB Lite
works.text: A light weight movie database React app. Movie information is obtained by making OMDb API requests.
